record.title: APPOINTMENT
record.chair: The Chair, on behalf of the majority leader, pursuant to Section 154 of Public Law 108-199, as amended, appoints the following Senator as Vice Chairman of the Senate Delegation to the U.S.-Russia Interparliamentary Group conference during the 110th Congress: The Honorable Judd Gregg of New Hampshire.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.
The legislative clerk proceeded to call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
